name: A Canterbury Pilgrimage 2
description:
It is 1350.  

After 500 days of lockdown, things are finally looking a bit more normal. 

Sit back, relax and follow the couch potato pilgrim's guide to Canterbury.  Martyrs, confessions, hard core prayers, souvenir shops... This is going to be one cracking devout summer.

PART 2 of 2

Inspired by the itinerary maps of Matthew Paris and Chaucer's Canterbury Tales, designed by my undiagnosed ADHD. Made with illuminated manuscript scraps and (mostly) historically accurate details in Unity.  For more deets on medieval pilgrimages to Canterbury see https://thebecketstory.org.uk/canterbury/visiting-cathedral.  Learn about the use and abuse of medieval miracles here: https://www.jstor.org/stable/24409215?seq=1 .
